welcome.title: Time Worth
welcome.subtitle: Make Mindful Purchase Decisions
welcome.description: See how many hours you need to work for each purchase. Track your spending and savings over time.

motivation.message1: This app helps more than 1,000 people save over ‚Ç¨200 per month
motivation.message2: Users save an average of 15% of their income
motivation.message3: Join thousands making smarter financial decisions
motivation.message4: Track your spending in work hours, not just money
motivation.message5: See the true cost of every purchase
motivation.message7: Your financial awareness journey starts now
motivation.message8: Small changes lead to big savings

name.title: What's your name?
name.description: We'll use this to personalize your experience.

age.title: How old are you?
age.description: This helps us provide age-appropriate financial insights.

profile.title: Let's get to know you
profile.description: We need some basic information to calculate your work hours.
profile.nameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters
profile.nameMax: Name must be at most 50 characters
profile.namePattern: Name can only contain letters and spaces

wage.title: What's your wage?
wage.description: This helps us calculate how many hours of work each purchase represents.
wage.wageNumber: Wage must be a valid number

currency.title: Choose your currency
currency.description: Select the currency you use for your transactions.

language.title: Choose your language
language.description: Select your preferred language for the app.

dashboard.subtitle: Track your mindful spending journey
dashboard.noTransactionsDesc: Tap the button below to check if an item is worth buying
dashboard.startSaving: Start saving to see your compound interest projections!

itemCheck.title: Is it worth it?
itemCheck.description: Enter the price to see how many hours of work it represents.

result.purchaseMessage: You spent {{hours}} of work on this item.
result.saveMessage: You saved {{hours}} of work by not buying this item!

history.title: History
history.noTransactionsDesc: Start checking if items are worth it!

transactionDetail.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction? This action cannot be undone.

themeSelection.title: Choose Theme
themeSelection.description: Select your preferred theme style. Changes apply immediately.
themeSelection.cuteDescription: Pastel colors, rounded shapes, and a playful aesthetic for a fun experience.
themeSelection.professionalDescription: Clean lines, muted colors, and a polished look for a business-like feel.
themeSelection.financialDescription: Dark, elegant design with gold accents. Perfect for serious financial tracking. Premium theme.

currencySettings.title: Change Currency
currencySettings.description: Select your preferred currency for displaying amounts.

languageSettings.title: Change Language
languageSettings.description: Select your preferred language for the app.

premium.title: Unlock Premium Features

premium.thankYou: Thank you for supporting Time Worth. Enjoy all premium features!

premium.restoredMessage: Your premium subscription has been restored successfully.
premium.disclaimer: Cancel anytime. Subscription renews automatically. Privacy policy and terms available in app.

features.financialThemeDesc: Elegant dark theme with gold accents for professional tracking
features.categoryBreakdownDesc: Visualize spending by category with interactive pie charts
features.weeklyInsightsDesc: Analyze spending patterns by day of week and daily trends
features.customDateRangeDesc: Compare any time periods and generate custom reports
features.yearOverYearDesc: Track your financial progress across multiple years
features.customInterestDesc: Adjust compound interest projections to match your investments
features.savingsGoalsDesc: Set and track specific savings targets with visual progress
features.budgetAlertsDesc: Get notified when approaching your spending limits
features.categoriesAndTagsDesc: Organize transactions with custom categories and tags
features.notesAndPhotosDesc: Attach receipts and add detailed notes to transactions
features.exportDataDesc: Download your financial data as CSV or PDF reports
features.unlimitedHistoryDesc: Access all your transactions, not just the last 3 months

premium.freeTrialMessage: Try Premium free for 7 days, then ‚Ç¨1/month
premium.historyLimitMessage: Free users can view the last 3 months of history. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited access to all your transactions.
